# Libraries  
```{r Libraries}

# Packages

# install.packages("tidytuesdayR")

# Libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(viridis)
library(maps)
library(mapdata)
library(mapproj)
```
# Data Upload

```{r Data Upload}

# Dataset: Democracy and Dictatorship

democracy_data <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2024/2024-11-05/democracy_data.csv')

view(democracy_data)

```

# Data Analyses

```{r Data Analyses}

world <- map_data("world")
view(world)

fm <- democracy_data %>% 
  select(country_name, is_female_monarch)

view(fm)

fm_country <- fm %>% 
  group_by(country_name, is_female_monarch) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  filter(is_female_monarch == "TRUE")

view(fm_country)

```
